sentences.en: After that it was non - stop , to the site of the International Horticultural Exposition of 1999!
sentences.cn: 之后, 我们又马不停蹄地去了建于1999年的世博园!

sentences.en: Cultivar Any agricultural or horticultural'variety '. The term is derived from the words cultivated variety.
sentences.cn: cultivar栽培 品系:任何农业上或园艺学上的变种. 这个词来源于栽培的变种.

sentences.en: Does the tour include Shenyang International Horticultural Expo Garden.
sentences.cn: 这次旅游包括沈阳世博园吗?

sentences.en: Embodying horticultural therapy and satisfying the needs of every body are basic trend in 21 st century.
sentences.cn: 园林设计中体现园艺疗法,满足各种群体的需求,是21世纪园林建设的根本趋势.

sentences.en: International Association of Horticultural Producers ( IAHP )
sentences.cn: 国际园艺生产者协会 ( 园艺协会 )

sentences.en: Light intensity has significant effects on photosynthesis of horticultural plants in many aspects.
sentences.cn: 光照强度在诸多方面对园艺植物光合作用具有显著影响.

sentences.en: Much of the crop losses are lost horticultural production in Florida and along the Gulf Coast.
sentences.cn: 损失主要集中在佛罗里达和墨西哥湾沿岸一带的蔬果等园艺领域.

sentences.en: New Shenyang, new International Horticultural Expo.
Plant - growing regulator plays an adjust role in the horticultural crop growing - process.
sentences.cn: 植物生长调节剂在园艺作物的生长发育全程中均能起到调控的作用.

sentences.en: Pruning is primary measure of control growth and hasten fruiting in horticultural plant.
sentences.cn: 整枝是园艺植物控制生长,促进结果的主要措施.

sentences.en: The scientists suggest that cultural horticultural science could improve the crops.
sentences.cn: 科学家表示,园艺学可能改进这些作物.

sentences.en: The Sydney Garden & Flower Show - This annual horticultural show will educate, impress and amaze.
sentences.cn: 悉尼花园 与 花表演 - 这年度园艺的表演将教育, 打动并且惊奇.

sentences.en: There will also be commercial stalls selling flowers and other horticultural products.
sentences.cn: 会场更设有售卖花卉及其他园艺产品的销售摊位.

sentences.en: World Horticulture Exposition garden: hosted the International Horticultural Exposition in 2006.
